image.name: Plex
image.desc: Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices

image.name: Emby
image.desc: Emby Server is a home media server built using popular open source technologies

image.name: Kodi Headless
image.desc: Headless docker image for running Kodi server

image.name: Couchpotato
image.desc: Download movies automatically, easily and in the best quality as soon as they are available

image.name: Sonarr
image.desc: Sonarr (formerly NZBdrone) is a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users

image.name: Sickrage
image.desc: Searches TheTVDB and TVRage for shows

image.name: Sickbeard
image.desc: Docker image for Sickbeard with French and English audio language

image.name: Deluge
image.desc: Deluge is a lightweight, Free Software, cross-platform BitTorrent client

image.name: Transmission
image.desc: Transmission is a rich and lightweight BitTorrent client with encryption, web UI, peer exchange, magnet links, DHT, ÂµTP and more

image.name: rTorrent
image.desc: rTorrent is a text-based ncurses BitTorrent client written in C++, based on the libTorrent libraries for Unix

image.name: SABnzbd
image.desc: SABnzbd is an Open Source Binary Newsreader written in Python

image.name: SCM-Manager
image.desc: The easiest way to share and manage your Git, Mercurial and Subversion repositories over http

image.name: Crashplan
image.desc: CrashPlan is a backup software for endpoint devices. It runs in the background of a device, providing constant backup to cloud or other devices.
